metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9984 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
The snd_msnd_interrupt function in sound/isa/msnd/msnd_pinnacle.c in theLinux kernel through 4.11.7 allows local users to cause a denial of service(over-boundary access) or possibly have unspecified other impact bychanging the value of a message queue head pointer between two kernel readsof that value, aka a "double fetch" vulnerability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9984` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
